title: Handy Art Little Masters Tempera Paints Set, 16 oz, Pack of 6 .
description: Tempera paint incorporates fine quality with an economical design to produce a great combination for the beginning artist. Blendable formula can be mixed with other colors to create unique works of art. Bright opaque colors will not chip, flake or crack when dry to hold its rich appearance for longer. Easy-to-clean paint washes out of most fabrics with just soap and water. Nontoxic paint is water-based for safe use by young learners.
